00044 __inline QIID MKQIID(QIID x, QIID y)
00045 {
00046         return x^y;
00047 }

00094 #define                                                 guidSIMPLES                                             GUID(0xE4EC7600, 0x10000000)
00095 
00096 #define                                                 guidBYTE                                                (guidSIMPLES+1)                                 // unsigned byte
00097 #define                                                 guidWORD                                                (guidBYTE+1)                                    // unsigned word
00098 #define                                                 guidDWORD                                               (guidWORD+1)                                    // unsigned dword
00099 #define                                                 guidQWORD                                               (guidDWORD+1)                                   // unsigned qword
00100 
00101 #define                                                 guidSBYTE                                               (guidQWORD+1)                                   // signed byte
00102 #define                                                 guidSWORD                                               (guidSBYTE+1)                                   // signed word
00103 #define                                                 guidSDWORD                                              (guidSWORD+1)                                   // signed dword
00104 #define                                                 guidSQWORD                                              (guidSDWORD+1)                                  // signed qword
00105 
00106 #define                                                 guidFLOAT                                               (guidSQWORD+1)                                  // float        range [0..1]
00107 #define                                                 guidDOUBLE                                              (guidFLOAT+1)                                   // double       range [0..1]
00108 
00109 #define                                                 guidSFLOAT                                              (guidDOUBLE+1)                                  // sfloat       range [-1..1]
00110 #define                                                 guidSDOUBLE                                             (guidSFLOAT+1)                                  // sdouble      range [-1..1]
00111

00150 
00151 __inline bool magictest(Afile *f, dword magic)
00152 {
00153         dword m;
00154         if(!f->read(&m, sizeof(m)))
00155                 return false;
00156         if(m==magic)
00157                 return true;
00158         return false;
00159 }
